
Epoch 12/30
100000/100000 [==============================] - 393s - loss: 1.5118     
Epoch 13/30
100000/100000 [==============================] - 393s - loss: 1.4814     
Epoch 14/30
100000/100000 [==============================] - 392s - loss: 1.4519     
Epoch 15/30
100000/100000 [==============================] - 393s - loss: 1.4228     
Epoch 16/30
100000/100000 [==============================] - 393s - loss: 1.3940     
Epoch 17/30
100000/100000 [==============================] - 393s - loss: 1.3659
